channel.title: Anyone with ideas?
channel.description: I'm looking for some ideas of things to make in Java (intermediate to difficult). Also, I was thinking about making some video tutorials (with mic :eek:) but I have no idea where to start. I would be happy to rep (+2 lol) for any good ideas.

item.title: Anyone with ideas?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If someone is working on more than one project they’re more likely to finish (instead of getting bored with the first one)

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone with ideas?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Write up an IRC client or something. If you’re doing it for practice, then just applications that you use everyday, try to replicate them as well to your ability as you can. Trust me, experience is the best practice in this field.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone with ideas?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

np just make sure you follow convention and stuff so ppl are learning things correctly. but ya let me know when u make the videos and ill view them. ill probably learn some stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone with ideas?
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:8, topic:408898”]so just ideas to make java tut videos? if u can explain things well, then just think of some functions java has and make a video tut on how to do them, like making some GUIs with different controls in them, connecting to programs via netty, or something making a simple client server program, database connections, 2d/3d graphics. i think those would be nice things to have tuts for and after have so many simple tuts make a video of using the previous tuts in a program.

just a thought. after i get better in java and programming in general i plan to make video tutorials to help ppl learn the language faster or w/e.[/quote]
Alright, great. Thanks ;D.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone with ideas?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

so just ideas to make java tut videos? if u can explain things well, then just think of some functions java has and make a video tut on how to do them, like making some GUIs with different controls in them, connecting to programs via netty, or something making a simple client server program, database connections, 2d/3d graphics. i think those would be nice things to have tuts for and after have so many simple tuts make a video of using the previous tuts in a program.

just a thought. after i get better in java and programming in general i plan to make video tutorials to help ppl learn the language faster or w/e.

Read full topic

2. Put a lighting candle saying I’m Rich.
3. Sell it for 1k dollars.

5. PROFIT

P.S: I got the idea from this: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I_Am_Rich[/quote]
